experience.metaDescription: A comprehensive overview of my professional experience, skills, and achievements across modern web development.
experience.heading: Professional Experience
experience.subheadingTemplate: {yearsOfExperience}+ years of building exceptional web experiences
experience.intro: My journey as a developer has taken me through various technologies, teams, and challenges. Here's a comprehensive overview of my professional experience, skills, and achievements.

coreCompetencies.title: Full-stack web development with modern frameworks
coreCompetencies.description: Design and build scalable web applications with modern architectures.

coreCompetencies.title: Responsive design and mobile-first development
coreCompetencies.description: Create adaptive interfaces optimized for every device.

coreCompetencies.title: Performance optimization and Core Web Vitals
coreCompetencies.description: Improve load times and UX through measurable performance work.

coreCompetencies.title: Cross-functional team collaboration and leadership
coreCompetencies.description: Partner with design, product, and engineering to ship quality work.

coreCompetencies.title: Accessibility standards and inclusive design
coreCompetencies.description: Build experiences that meet accessibility standards and serve all users.

coreCompetencies.title: Cloud platforms and DevOps practices
coreCompetencies.description: Deploy and maintain reliable systems with modern cloud tooling.
